  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_378</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Funciones trigonométricas</string>
            <string language="en">Trigonometric functions.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trigonometrische Funktionen.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fonctions trigonométriques.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Funções trigonometric.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Funzioni trigonometriche.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Trigonometric λειτουργίες.</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones las funciones trigonométricas. Se muestra su definición a partir del concepto de razón trigonométrica y se estudian sus propiedades gráficas.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses visuals to teach trigonometric functions. The definition is explained using the concept of trigonometric ratio, and the graphical properties are studied.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">coseno</string>
            <string language="en">cosine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">seno</string>
            <string language="en">sine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">trigonométrica</string>
            <string language="en">trigonometric</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">tangente</string>
            <string language="en">tangent</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">función</string>
            <string language="en">function</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Sichtbarmachungen, trigonometrische Funktionen zu unterrichten. 
Die Definition wird mit dem Konzept des trigonometrischen 
Verhältnisses erklärt, und die graphischen Eigenschaften werden 
studiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations visuels 
d'enseigner des fonctions trigonométriques. La définition est 
expliquée en utilisant le concept du taux trigonométrique, et les 
propriétés graphiques sont étudiées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos visuals ensinar funções 
trigonometric. A definição é explicada usando o conceito da 
relação trigonometric, e as propriedades gráficas são estudadas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi rappresentazioni insegnare 
le funzioni trigonometriche. La definizione è spiegata usando 
il concetto del rapporto trigonometrico e le proprietà grafiche sono 
studiate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τα visuals για 
να διδάξει τις trigonometric λειτουργίες. Ο καθορισμός 
εξηγείται χρησιμοποιώντας την έννοια της trigonometric 
αναλογίας, και οι γραφικές ιδιότητες μελετώνται.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kosinus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sinus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">trigonometrisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tangente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
